name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric BAINES, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric BAINES, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
This appeal is dismissed as improvidently granted, without prejudice to appellant’s rights under the Post Conviction Hearing Act. 42 Pa.C.S. § 9541-9551.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
522 A.2d 503
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Eric BAINES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 10, 1987.
Edward Blumstein, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Deputy Dist. Atty., Ronald Eisenberg, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
